FILE: cm740840v11.0.txt
DYAD: JAPAN - PHILIPPINES
RIVALRY: RIV1334
DISPUTE(S): MID3612 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190317
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190317

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3612 

TERRMID: MID3612 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3612 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3612 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3612 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID3612 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3612 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3612 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3612 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3612 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3612 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID3612 from Gibler 2018, in 1982 Philippines attacked a Japanese vessel, claiming that it was carrying rebels and weapons for rebels that the Philippines was fighting against. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebel activity in Philippines. 

CIVWARLINK: MID3612 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3612 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3612 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3612 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3612 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3612 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
